name: Bengali Current Affairs 2020
description: Welcome, all of you - From now on you will get the Current Affairs in Bengali every day in this application. Daily Current Affairs Update In Bengali Langauge 2019  Daily Bengali current affairs and Bengali Gk update for Govt. Job News And Exams Suggestion like SSC CHSL, SSC CGL,RRC group D, RRB NTPC, LIC, SBI, CTET, WBPTET, WBPSC, WBCS, WB police etc.  Bengali Current Affairs App is a FREE Govt. exam preparation Bengali App, which helps and guides you to prepare for Government And Private Jobs Examination like -  1. Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) Jobs: RRB ALP, RRB JE, RRB NTPC, RRB Group D, etc.  2. Bank Jobs: RBI Assistant, IBPS PO, IBPS Clerk, IBPS SO, SBI PO, SBI Clerk, SBI Specialist Officers, IBPS RRBs, RBI Grade B, LIC Assistant  3. Staff Selection Commission (SSC) Jobs: SSC CGL, SSC CPO, SSC CHSL, SSC MTS etc.  4. Teaching Jobs: CTET & WB PTET.  5. Defence Jobs: WB Police SI, NDA, CDS, CRPF, CAPF  6. Public Service Commission (PSC) Jobs : West Bengal Civil Services (WBCS) WBPSC Clerkship, WBPSC Miscellaneous,  Other Jobs : all other Government jobs in India & individual states of India, specially West Bengal Government jobs.  Daily Current Affairs update in Bengali Langauge is the best feature of this app.  Application Features  Every Day Current Affairs Update  Every Day Exam Notes Update  Every Day Govt. Job News Update  All Exam Pdf Notes Available Here  Every Day Bengali Mock Test  Important Sections  1.Daily Bengali Current Affairs Update: Current affairs is the most important part of any WB government jobs.  2. General Knowledge In Bengali : All subjects according to Syllabus of all type of Government And Private jobs in India as well as West Bengal Government jobs are covered.   Please give your feedback on the App. We obviously will try our best to make Kumar 360 better and more useful and helpful to you as per your feedback.
